dmca.title: NOT A CEASE AND DESIST
dmca.body:
My filter tells me I am getting these emails from you.  You have already been told how to create a filter yourself.  Cease and desist or I will contact the Dean of Student to file a complaint.

Here is information on creating a filter again:

These e-mails are sent to all active bgnet accounts.  It is not possible to remove your name from the list unless you have your bgnet account closed.  This is not a listproc; it is a broadcaste e-mail.  It is possible to filter these emails so they go directly into the trash.  You need to go under the "Special" menu and scroll down to "Make Filter".  The instructions are self-explanatory from that point.  If you have further questions, contact (419) 372-0999 for technical support (not Marketing and Communications).
